pr_title: Move Span context accessors to Span static methods.

timeline.message: Move Span context accessors to Span static methods.

timeline.bodyText: Since it's likely SpanContext won't actually be renamed, getContext() desparately needs to be renamed to getSpanContext().
timeline.author: anuraaga

timeline.bodyText: Question from the SIG meeting today: would it make sense to have a method on ImplicitContextKeyed for retrieving the item from the Context as well? Seems like having both saving and retrieval would be a win.
timeline.author: jkwatson

replies.bodyText: It came to mind, but these need to be static so can't :)
replies.author: anuraaga

replies.bodyText: hmmm. Yeah, no static methods on an interface. This is what happens when I try to reason about things the morning after the 10pm meeting the night before. ;)
replies.author: jkwatson
